item.title: A week of nuclear theater yields an important lesson
item.description: In today’s uncertain world, deterrence is more important than dreams of arms reduction.

item.title: Nostalgia needs a reality check
item.description: Policy built on a longing for the past will doom the nation’s future.

item.title: This is for the Horse Girls. You might be one.
item.description: The style world has declared it “Horse Girl fall,” but our passions are never out of season.

item.title: The Supreme Court justices to watch during the tariffs oral argument
item.description: This term’s biggest case is a jump ball, with an unusually large number of swing votes.

item.title: RFK Jr.’s offshore wind fishing expedition
item.description: Opponents of the energy source invent problems to discredit a business they don’t like.

item.title: Trump’s refugee cap is a cruelty without a constituency
item.description: Most Americans still support welcoming refugees. The president’s new limit betrays that generosity.

item.title: The unaffordability of Obamacare comes home to roost
item.description: ACA subsidies are a Band-Aid for a fundamentally broken health care system.

item.title: Trump vows to correct daylight saving time
item.description: Plus, the sun should orbit around us!

item.title: Biden alumni have Trump envy
item.description: A new report finds Democrats vowing to wield power more assertively the next time they get a chance.

item.title: The folly of Washington’s hunger games
item.description: Nuclear threats and food cuts show the insanity of a deadlocked government.
